com.continuuity.weave.internal
Class ApplicationBundler

java.lang.Object
  com.continuuity.weave.internal.ApplicationBundler

public final class ApplicationBundler
extends Object

This class builds jar files based on class dependencies.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a ApplicationBundler.

 void createBundle(File targetFile, Iterable<Class<?>> classes)
          Creates a jar file which includes all the given classes and all the classes that they depended on.

Constructor Detail

ApplicationBundler

public ApplicationBundler(Iterable<String> excludePackages,
                          Iterable<String> includePackages)
Constructs a ApplicationBundler.

Parameters:
excludePackages - Class packages to exclude
includePackages - Always includes classes/resources in these packages. Note that classes in these packages will not get inspected for dependencies.
Method Detail

createBundle

public void createBundle(File targetFile,
                         Iterable<Class<?>> classes)
                  throws IOException
Creates a jar file which includes all the given classes and all the classes that they depended on. The jar will also include all classes and resources under the packages as given as include packages in the constructor.

Parameters:
targetFile - Where to save the target jar file.
classes - Set of classes to start the dependency traversal.
Throws:
IOException

createBundle

public void createBundle(File targetFile,
                         Class<?> clz,
                         Class<?>... classes)
                  throws IOException
Same as calling createBundle(java.io.File, Iterable).

Throws:
IOException
